browse-prompt: Browse tickets using the list on the left.
drop-files-prompt: Drop files here to attach them to this comment
ticket-description: Describe what you think needs to be changed
extra-settings-description: Set extra properties of this ticket
importance-description: How important is this ticket? Is it a feature request, or is it a grave security issue?
privacy-description: Does this ticket contain a security issue?
privacy-warning: Only set this to "Keep Private" if you are reporting a security issue.
email-validation-complete-description: Thanks, your email is now validated.
select-project-description: To start filing a ticket, go ahead and select the project it should be filed under.
login-error-description: We couldn't log you in. Try logging in again.
load-error-description: Loading the Bug Reporting tool failed. This might be because of a server error, or it may be because of an unstable internet connection.
offline-description: You are offline. To continue using the bugtracker, connect to the internet.
disconnected-description: You have been disconnected from the server
log-in-required-description: You'll need to log in to perform this action
edit-comment-description: How would you like to amend your comment?
user-management-description: Hello $1! What would you like to do today?
log-out-confirmation: Do you want to log out of your account?
delete-account-1: You will no longer be able to log in
delete-account-2: You will no longer be able to file new tickets
delete-account-3: You will no longer be able to participate in comments
delete-account-4: Your current username and email address will be available for use by new accounts
delete-account-5: Your comments and existing tickets will not be deleted
delete-account-confirmation: If you're sure you want to delete your account, enter your password below to confirm that it's you.
delete-account-error: That didn't work. Try entering your password again
delete-account-warning: WARNING: This is the final step. Your account will be deleted after you click "Delete my account."
obfuscated-link-warning: Links from other people can be dangerous. The link you clicked on will go to the following address:
obfuscated-link-confirmation: Do you want to visit this site?
rate-limited-description: Reload the page after that time to continue using the bugtracker.
verification-needed: Your email needs to be verified.
verification-needed-1: You won't be able to receive any emails from the bug tracker while your email is not verified.
verification-needed-2: To verify your email, find the verification link in your inbox. If you can't find it, you may want to check your spam folder.
verification-needed-3: If you need the link resent, please send an email to $1.
login-prompt: Log in to the bugtracker using your username and password.
login-error: That didn't work. Check your email and password and enter it again.
register-explanation: Register to make comments and report on bugs.
register-error-tc: You'll need to agree to the terms and conditions.
2fa-auth-prompt: Obtain a verification code to verify your identity by opening the Two Factor Authentication app on your phone.
2fa-error: That didn't work. Check your code and enter it again.
